All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddPlayerMessage
The AddPlayerMessage class represents a message sent from the server to a client to notify the addition of a player.
AlreadyDrawnException
 
AvailableColorsMessage
The AvailableColorsMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to provide a list of available colors for selection.
BeginDrawMessage
The BeginDrawMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to indicate the beginning of a draw phase with the provided game view.
BeginTurnMessage
The BeginTurnMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to indicate the beginning of a turn with the provided game view.
Buffer
A thread-safe buffer class that uses a queue to store string data.
CardCorner
The CardCorner class represents a corner of a card, which can hold a symbol and be hidden or covered.
Chat
The Chat class represents the functions connected to the chat present in the game
ChatMessage
The ChatMessage class represents a message in the chat.
ChooseColorMessage
The ChooseColorMessage class represents a message sent from the client to the server to choose a color for the player.
ChooseHiddenGoalMessage
The ChooseHiddenGoalMessage class represents a message sent from the client to the server to choose a hidden goal card for the player.
ChooseInitialCardSideMessage
The ChooseInitialCardSideMessage class represents a message sent from the client to the server to choose the side (front or back) of an initial card.
Client
The Client class serves as the entry point for the game client application.
ClientActions
Interface representing the actions that a client can perform in the game.
ClientHandler
The ClientHandler class manages communication with a single client connected to the server.
ColorSelectorController
Controller class for managing color selection in a graphical user interface (GUI).
CommonBoardView
The CommonBoardView class represents the view of the common board in the game.
Constants
 
CreateGameController
Controller class for handling the creation of a game in a graphical user interface (GUI).
CreateGameMessage
The CreateGameMessage class represents a message sent from the client to the server to create a new game.
Deck
The Deck interface represents a deck of game cards.
DrawCardMessage
The DrawCardMessage class represents a message sent from the client to the server to draw a card.
EmptyDeckException
 
EndGameController
Controller class for managing the end game screen in a graphical user interface (GUI).
EventType
 
Flow
The Flow class implements the game flow logic, handling client actions and game events.
FullLobbyException
 
Game
The Game class represents the overall game state, including decks of cards, face-up cards on the table, common goals, available colors, and drawn goal cards.
GameBoardController
Controller class for managing the game board UI and interactions.
GameCard
The GameCard class represents an abstract game card with corners, an image ID, and a kingdom.
GameCardView
The GameCardView class represents a view of a game card, containing information about its type, description, and ID.
GameController
The GameController class manages the game state, player actions, and game flow.
GameControllerInterface
The GameControllerInterface defines methods for controlling game actions remotely.
GameEndedMessage
The GameEndedMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to indicate that the game has ended, providing information about the winner and rank.
GameListener
GameListener is an interface for receiving game events from the server.
GameListenerClient
The GameListenerClient class implements the GameListener interface and is Serializable.
GameListenerClientSocket
The GameListenerClientSocket class implements the GameListener interface and handles communication with the client via socket by sending messages.
GameStatus
 
GameView
The GameView class represents a view of the game, including information about the current player, game ID, player's private view, common board view, and game status.
GoalCard
The GoalCard class represents an abstract goal card in the game.
GoalDeck
The GoalDeck class represents a deck of goal cards in the game.
GoldCard
The GoldCard class represents a specific type of playable card in the game, extending PlayableCard.
GoldDeck
The GoldDeck class represents a deck of gold cards.
GUI
GUI class responsible for managing user interface interactions and displaying game views.
GUIApplication
GUIApplication class extends Application and manages the JavaFX application lifecycle and UI scenes.
GUIController
Abstract base class for GUI controllers in the application.
HeartBeat
The HeartBeat class represents the heartbeat information for a player.
HeartBeatMessage
The HeartBeatMessage class represents a heartbeat message sent from the client to the server.
HeartbeatSender
The HeartbeatSender class represents a thread that sends periodic heartbeat signals to a server, indicating that the client is still active and connected.
HiddenGoalChoiceMessage
The HiddenGoalChoiceMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to convey the choices for hidden goals during gameplay.
InitialCard
The InitialCard class represents a specific type of game card that extends GameCard.
InitialCardSelectorController
Controller class for the initial card selection screen.
InitialCardSideMessage
The InitialCardSideMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to convey the views of an initial card's front and back sides.
InitialDeck
The InitialDeck class represents a deck of initial cards.
InputParser
The InputParser class extends the Thread class and processes input commands from a buffer.
InputReader
The InputReader interface provides a method to retrieve a buffer.
InputReaderCLI
The InputReaderCLI class extends the Thread class and implements the InputReader interface.
InputReaderGUI
The InputReaderGUI class implements the InputReader interface.
InvalidNumPlayersMessage
The InvalidNumPlayersMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to notify about an invalid number of players.
InvalidPositioningException
 
InvalidPositioningMessage
The InvalidPositioningMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to notify about an invalid positioning of game elements.
JoinFirstGameAvailableMessage
The JoinFirstGameAvailableMessage class represents a message sent from the client to join the first available game.
JoinGameController
Controller class for joining a game lobby.
Kingdom
 
LobbyController
The LobbyController class manages the creation and joining of game lobbies.
LobbyControllerInterface
The LobbyControllerInterface defines methods for managing game lobbies remotely.
LobbyViewController
Controller class for displaying players in a lobby.
MenuController
Controller class for the main menu UI.
NicknameAlreadyUsedMessage
The NicknameAlreadyUsedMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to notify about a nickname that is already in use.
NoLobbyAvailableMessage
The NoLobbyAvailableMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to notify about the unavailability of any lobby to join.
NotAvailableColorMessage
The NotAvailableColorMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to notify about unavailable color choices.
NotExistingPlayerException
 
ObliqueDisposition
The ObliqueDisposition class represents a specific type of goal card where players score points based on oblique arrangements on their game board.
OutOfBoundsException
 
Placement
The Placement class represents a placement of a game card on the board.
PlayableCard
The PlayableCard class represents a specific type of game card that extends GameCard.
PlayCardMessage
The PlayCardMessage class represents a message sent from the client to play a card on the game board.
Player
The Player class represents a player in the game, holding their state including nickname, color, score, playing hand, initial card, hidden goal, visible symbols, game board, placement order, and possible placements.
PlayerColor
 
PlayerJoinedMessage
The PlayerJoinedMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to notify that a player has joined the game.
PlayerNumberException
 
PrivatePlayerView
The PrivatePlayerView class represents the view of a player's private information.
PublicBoardView
The PublicBoardView class represents the public view of the game board.
PublicPlayerView
The PublicPlayerView class represents the public view of a player.
RequirementsNotMetException
 
RequirementsNotMetMessage
The RequirementsNotMetMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to notify that the requirements for an action or condition were not met.
ResourceCard
The ResourceCard class represents a specific type of playable card that extends PlayableCard.
ResourceDeck
The ResourceDeck class represents a deck of resource cards.
RMIClient
The RMIClient class represents a client that interacts with a remote server using RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
RMIServer
The RMIServer class represents a server implementation using RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
Root
 
SceneDesc
Represents a description of a scene in a graphical user interface (GUI) application.
Scenes
 
SendPrivateMessageMessage
The SendPrivateMessageMessage class represents a message sent from the client to send a private message to another user.
SendPublicMessageMessage
The SendPublicMessageMessage class represents a message sent from the client to send a public message to all users in the lobby or game.
SentMessageMessage
The SentMessageMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to notify that a message has been successfully sent from one user to another.
Server
The Server class initializes and starts the game server components.
SocketClient
The SocketClient class represents a client that connects to a server using sockets and interacts with the server by sending and receiving messages.
SocketClientMessage
The SocketClientMessage abstract class represents a message sent from a client to a server via sockets.
SocketServer
The SocketServer class represents a server that listens for incoming socket connections from clients and manages multiple client connections using multithreading.
SocketServerMessage
The SocketServerMessage abstract class represents a message sent from a server to a client via sockets.
Sound
Provides methods for playing audio sounds in a Java application.
Symbol
 
SymbolGoal
The SymbolGoal class represents a specific type of goal card where players score points based on specific symbols on their game board.
TaskOnNetworkDisconnection
The TaskOnNetworkDisconnection class represents a task to handle actions when a network disconnection occurs.
TUI
The TUI (Textual User Interface) class extends the UI class.
UI
 
VerticalDisposition
The VerticalDisposition class represents a specific type of goal card where players score points based on vertical arrangements of kingdoms on their game board.
WrongCardPlayMessage
The WrongCardPlayMessage class represents a message sent from the server to the client to notify that a player attempted an invalid card play.
WrongHiddenGoalException
